laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Serum saturated very-long-chain fatty acid levels
laboratory_examinations.findings: High levels in the proband, his mother, and oldest sister.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Mutation analysis on tissue from skin biopsy
laboratory_examinations.findings: Confirmed the presence of hemizygous stop codon mutation p.Y181X (c.929C [G) in ABCD1 gene.
Suggested a demyelinating distal process of the lower limbs.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Magnetic resonance imaging of cervical and thoracic spine
